title: RecursiveManager Production Readiness - Complete Implementation
description:
Implement all remaining items from PRODUCTION_READINESS_PLAN.md to make RecursiveManager production-ready:

Phase 1: Fix integration test timeouts, linting errors, message retrieval bug, scheduler methods
Phase 2: Implement 5 missing CLI commands (hire, fire, execute, pause, resume)
Phase 3: Fix VitePress build, create 10 documentation pages
Phase 4: Configure GitHub Pages, create v1.0 release
Phase 5: Create E2E test suite
Phase 6: Add performance benchmarks and health monitoring
Phase 7: Polish error messages and UX

See PRODUCTION_READINESS_PLAN.md in repository root for complete details.
